instructions: In a large microwave-safe bowl, combine all ingredients; mix well. Cover and microwave on high for 2-3 minutes or until heated through and cheese is melted, stirring twice. To make sand castles, pack rice mixture into 1/2-cup and 1/4-cup measures; unmold and stack on dinner plates.
ingredients: 4 ounces processed cheese food (eg. Velveeta), cubed
title: Rice Sand Castles
